description: Phase 5 COMPLETE: Implemented fast_explore Dependencies mode using TDD methodology. Wrote 6 failing tests (RED), implemented BFS graph traversal (GREEN), added comprehensive tool description. All 31 exploration tests pass (20 find_logic + 5 similar + 6 dependencies). Dependencies mode analyzes transitive dependencies via relationship graph traversal (imports, uses, calls, references, extends, implements) with depth control (default 3, max 10). Circular dependency handling via visited set. Performance <50ms. Fixed db_path() bug by using generate_workspace_id() + workspace_db_path(). Zero regressions.
